testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to update the shop information with the specified id number via API connection.
testcase.name: admin SHOP When a PATCH request is sent to the api/shop/edit/{id} endpoint with valid authorization,

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. JSON path name doesn't match. Expected: MNG Actual: Prof Cargo

testcase.failure:
* The api user sets "api/shop/edit" path parameters.........................passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing 8, "MNG", "1111111111", "New York" and 1 information to send to the api shopedit endpoint..passed * The api user sends a "PATCH" request and saves the returned response......passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Updated"..passed * The api user verifies that the "data" "Updated Shop ID" information in the returned response body is the same as the id path parameter written in the endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the "name" is "MNG" by sending a GET request to the "api" "shop" endpoint with the "data" "Updated Shop ID" returned in the response body..failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: 1 expectation failed. JSON path name doesn't match. Expected: MNG Actual: Prof Cargo
